entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is trying to explain a situation to Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is upset with Ron and storms out of the changing room.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Hermione's boyfriend, who has offended Hermione in some way.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: A person that Hermione kissed, which Ron took offense to.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are friends, but Harry is trying to explain a situation to her.
Ron and Hermione are in a romantic relationship, but Ron has taken offense to something Hermione did.
Harry knows Viktor Krum because he is connected to him through his friend Hermione, who kissed Viktor.
